description.db:para: This table is used by the Call Center module to store the definition of the agents serving the flows/queues. More information can be found at: &OPENSIPS_MOD_DOC;call_center.html.

column.name: agentid
column.description: The unique ID of the agent in the Call Center module - to be used to identify the agent in the module and from outside the module; It is an alphanumerical string.

column.name: location
logstate
skills
column.description: Comma separated list of skills offered by the agent; these skills must match the skills used in the queues/flows definition; In order to receive calls from a flow, the agent must have the skill required by that flow.

column.name: last_call_end
column.description: The timestamp of the last call of an agent. If different than 0, the agent will only receive calls after wrapup seconds pass after this timestamp.
